About.mission: We're on a mission to make survey creation accessible to everyone. No technical skills required, no complexity‚Äîjust powerful, beautiful surveys that help you collect valuable insights.
About.story_content: Survey Platform was born from a simple frustration: existing survey tools were either too expensive or too complicated. We wanted to create something different‚Äîa modern, user-friendly platform that anyone could use to gather feedback and make data-driven decisions. Whether you're a small business owner, researcher, or part of a growing team, our platform adapts to your needs without the learning curve.
About.value_1_desc: We prioritize simplicity and ease of use in everything we build. Our interface is intuitive, our workflows are streamlined, and every feature is designed with you in mind.
About.value_2_desc: Your data is yours. We never sell or share your information with third parties. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your surveys and responses.
About.value_3_desc: Complex features, simple interface. That's our philosophy. We believe powerful tools don't have to be complicated, and we work hard to keep everything straightforward.
About.value_4_desc: We continuously improve and add new features based on user feedback. Your input drives our roadmap, and we're committed to evolving alongside your needs.
About.team_member_1_bio: Passionate about building tools that empower people to make better decisions through data.
About.team_member_2_bio: Focused on creating delightful user experiences and turning feedback into actionable features.
About.tech_subheading: We use cutting-edge technologies to deliver a fast, reliable, and scalable survey platform that you can depend on.
About.tech_nextjs: Modern web framework for lightning-fast performance and seamless user experiences
About.tech_react: Interactive UI library for building dynamic, responsive interfaces
About.tech_typescript: Type-safe development ensuring fewer bugs and more reliable code
About.tech_postgresql: Reliable relational database for secure and consistent data storage
About.tech_tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for beautiful, customizable designs
About.contact_cta_description: Have questions or want to discuss custom solutions for your organization? We'd love to hear from you.

Features.hero_subheading: Everything you need to create, distribute, and analyze professional surveys. From intuitive builders to real-time analytics, we've got you covered.
Features.survey_creation_description: Build beautiful surveys with our powerful creation tools designed for ease and flexibility.
Features.survey_creation_drag_drop_desc: Effortlessly arrange questions with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. No technical skills required‚Äîjust drag, drop, and you're done.
Features.survey_creation_question_types_desc: Choose from text input, multiple choice, rating scales, checkboxes, dropdowns, yes/no, and more. Every question type you need to collect precise data.
Features.survey_creation_templates_desc: Jump-start your survey creation with professionally designed templates. Customer satisfaction, employee feedback, market research, and more.
Features.survey_creation_conditional_desc: Create dynamic surveys that adapt based on responses. Show or hide questions intelligently to create personalized survey experiences.
Features.distribution_description: Share your surveys easily across multiple channels and reach your audience wherever they are.
Features.distribution_links_desc: Generate unique, shareable links for your surveys. Share via email, social media, or anywhere online with a single click.
Features.distribution_embed_desc: Seamlessly integrate surveys into your website or blog with our simple embed codes. No coding expertise required.
Features.distribution_qr_desc: Instantly generate QR codes for your surveys. Perfect for events, print materials, and in-person data collection.
Features.analytics_description: Turn responses into actionable insights with our comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.
Features.analytics_realtime_desc: Watch responses come in live as participants complete your survey. Never miss a beat with instant notifications and live dashboards.
Features.analytics_charts_desc: Transform raw data into beautiful bar charts, pie charts, and visualizations. Understand trends and patterns at a glance.
Features.analytics_export_desc: Export all your survey data to CSV format for deeper analysis in Excel, Google Sheets, or your analytics tool of choice.
Features.analytics_filtering_desc: Filter and segment responses by date, completion status, and other criteria. Focus on the data that matters most to you.
Features.collaboration_description: Work together seamlessly with your team using our powerful collaboration features.
Features.collaboration_organizations_desc: Create organizations to manage surveys as a team. Keep everything organized and accessible to the right people.
Features.collaboration_roles_desc: Control access with granular role-based permissions. Assign roles like Owner, Admin, Member, and Viewer to manage who can do what.
Features.collaboration_members_desc: Invite team members, manage permissions, and collaborate efficiently. Everyone stays in sync with shared surveys and responses.
Features.faq_subheading: Everything you need to know about our features
Features.faq_1_question: Can I create surveys without coding?
Features.faq_1_answer: Yes! Our drag-and-drop builder makes survey creation incredibly easy. Simply drag questions, add options, and publish‚Äîno coding or technical expertise required.
Features.faq_2_question: How many question types are supported?
Features.faq_2_answer: We support 10+ question types including text input (short and long), multiple choice, checkboxes, rating scales, dropdowns, yes/no questions, and more. Each type is fully customizable to fit your needs.
Features.faq_3_answer: Yes, you can export all survey responses to CSV format at any time. This allows you to perform deeper analysis in Excel, Google Sheets, or any other analytics tool you prefer.
Features.faq_4_answer: Yes! Create organizations, invite team members, and assign role-based permissions. Collaborate seamlessly with your team while maintaining control over who can view and edit surveys.
Features.faq_5_question: Can I embed surveys on my website?
Features.faq_5_answer: Absolutely! We provide easy-to-use embed codes that allow you to integrate surveys directly into your website or blog. No coding skills required‚Äîjust copy and paste.
Features.cta_subheading: Start creating professional surveys today with all the features you need to succeed.
Features.cta_button: Start Free - No Credit Card Required

Privacy.meta_description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data. GDPR and CCPA compliant privacy policy.
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.overview_p1: At Survey Platform, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our survey creation and management platform.
Privacy.overview_p2: By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).
Privacy.data_collection_intro: We collect the following types of information:
Privacy.data_collection_account_name: Name and email address when you register
Privacy.data_collection_account_email: Email address for account verification and communications
Privacy.data_collection_survey_content: Survey titles, descriptions, questions, and settings you create
Privacy.data_collection_survey_responses: Survey responses collected from your respondents
Privacy.data_collection_usage_clicks: Interactions with survey builder and analytics
Privacy.data_collection_usage_browser: Browser type, device type, and operating system
Privacy.data_collection_usage_ip: IP address and approximate geographic location
Privacy.data_collection_payment_info: Payment information is processed securely by Stripe. We do not store your complete credit card numbers or CVV codes. We receive only metadata about your subscription status.
Privacy.data_usage_intro: We use your data for the following purposes:
Privacy.data_usage_service_desc: To operate our survey platform, enable survey creation, and deliver responses
Privacy.data_usage_improve_desc: To analyze usage patterns and improve our features and user experience
Privacy.data_usage_support_desc: To respond to your inquiries and provide technical assistance
Privacy.data_usage_security_desc: To detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security incidents
Privacy.data_usage_legal_desc: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service
Privacy.data_storage_intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
Privacy.data_storage_encryption_desc: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest (AES-256)
Privacy.data_storage_database_desc: Data is stored in secure PostgreSQL databases with regular backups
Privacy.data_storage_access_desc: Limited access to production data; authentication required for all operations
Privacy.data_storage_retention_desc: Data is retained as long as your account is active; deleted within 30 days of account deletion
Privacy.user_rights_intro: Under GDPR and CCPA, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
Privacy.user_rights_access_desc: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
Privacy.user_rights_correction_desc: Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete data
Privacy.user_rights_deletion_desc: Request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten")
Privacy.user_rights_export_desc: Export your data in a machine-readable format (CSV/JSON)
Privacy.user_rights_withdraw_desc: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
Privacy.user_rights_object_desc: Object to certain types of data processing (e.g., marketing)
Privacy.user_rights_exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@survey.fatihoune.com or use our contact form.
Privacy.cookies_intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide and improve our service:
Privacy.cookies_essential_desc: Required for authentication, security, and basic platform functionality. These cannot be disabled.
Privacy.cookies_analytics_desc: Help us understand how users interact with our platform (Google Analytics, PostHog)
Privacy.cookies_preferences_desc: Remember your language preference, theme, and other settings
Privacy.cookies_manage: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings. See our Cookie Policy for detailed information about each cookie we use.
Privacy.third_party_intro: We work with trusted third-party services to provide our platform:
Privacy.third_party_stripe_desc: Stripe processes all payments and subscription billing. Payment information is handled according to Stripe's privacy policy and PCI-DSS compliance standards.
Privacy.third_party_analytics_desc: We use Google Analytics and PostHog to understand user behavior and improve our platform. These services collect anonymized usage data.
Privacy.third_party_email_desc: We use Resend to send transactional emails (account verification, password resets, notifications).
Privacy.contact_intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data rights, please contact us:
Privacy.cookie_banner_description: We use cookies and analytics tools to improve your experience and understand how you use our platform. You can choose to accept or reject analytics cookies.

Cookies.meta_description: Learn about the cookies we use and how to manage your cookie preferences.
Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.overview_p1: This Cookie Policy explains how Survey Platform uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website and use our services.
Cookies.overview_p2: It explains what these technologies are, why we use them, and your rights to control their use.
Cookies.what_are_cookies_p1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
Cookies.what_are_cookies_p2: Cookies can be "persistent" (remain on your device until deleted or expired) or "session" (deleted when you close your browser).
Cookies.cookies_we_use_intro: We use the following types of cookies on our platform:
Cookies.cookies_essential_desc: These cookies are required for the platform to function. They enable authentication, security features, and basic functionality. You cannot opt out of these cookies.
Cookies.cookies_analytics_desc: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our platform. They collect anonymous information about pages visited, time spent, and interactions. You can opt out of these cookies.
Cookies.cookies_preferences_desc: These cookies remember your settings and preferences, such as language selection and theme. They improve your user experience by personalizing the interface.
Cookies.cookie_session_purpose: Maintains your login session and authentication state
Cookies.cookie_csrf_purpose: Protects against cross-site request forgery attacks
Cookies.cookie_ga_property_purpose: Google Analytics - Stores and counts page views
Cookies.cookie_posthog_purpose: PostHog analytics - Tracks user interactions and feature usage
Cookies.manage_cookies_intro: You have several options to manage and control cookies:
Cookies.manage_chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
Cookies.manage_firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
Cookies.manage_edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Manage and delete cookies
Cookies.manage_impact_desc: If you disable essential cookies, you will not be able to log in or use core features of the platform. Disabling analytics cookies will not affect functionality but will prevent us from understanding how the platform is used.
Cookies.contact_intro: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

Analytics.page_description: View key metrics and analytics for your platform
Analytics.external_analytics_description: Access detailed analytics in external platforms
Analytics.ga4_description: View detailed user behavior and conversion analytics
